vote.title: Authorize the first of two, one-year renewal options to the service contract with Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas, Inc. to provide nursing home ombudsman services, which includes: receiving, investigating and resolving complaints and assisting in obtaining goods or services for seniors residing in nursing homes and assisted living facilities within the city of Dallas for the period of October 1, 2020 through September 30, 2021 - Not to exceed $116,868.00 - Financing:  General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the first of two, one-year renewal options to the service contract with Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas, Inc. to provide nursing home ombudsman services, which includes: receiving, investigating and resolving complaints and assisting in obtaining goods or services for seniors residing in nursing homes and assisted living facilities within the city of Dallas for the period of October 1, 2020 through September 30, 2021 - Not to exceed $116,868.00 - Financing:  General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
